name: RallyTaxi
description:
crash , race and jump over Paradise harbour as you attempt to get customers to there destinations on time. Rally Taxi is a race against the clock were the winner is based off the amount of fare earned.

challenge your friends on the online leader board and try to beat the high score

controls--

a - steer left

d - steer right

w - accelerate

s - brake/ reverse

space - boost

esc - pause
